articles.author: Jonathan Chadwick, Afp
articles.title: Ukraine conflict likely to delay Rosalind Franklin mission - Daily Mail
articles.description: According to the ESA, the ambitious UK-built Rosalind Franklin rover is now 'very unlikely' to launch in 2022 as a result of the ongoing armed conflict in Ukraine.
articles.content:
Russia's war on Ukraine is likely to delay the upcoming Rosalind Franklin mission to Mars, according to the European Space Agency (ESA). 
In a statement published Monday, ESA said it has 'fully impl… [+8339 chars]

articles.author: Anugraha Sundaravelu
articles.title: Asteroid four times as big as the Shard set to cross paths with Earth - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: The asteroid has been classed by astronomers as 'potentially hazardous'.
articles.content:
Nasa classifies asteroids that come within less than 7.5 million km of Earth as potentially hazardous. (Picture: Getty)
An asteroid four times as big as the Shard is just days away from safely cross… [+2029 chars]
